Alia Bhatt Height | Weight | Age | Boyfriend | Family | Biography | Wiki

Bolly Reporter
8 months ago

Alia Bhatt is an Indian Film Actress and Singer. Furthermore, she is one of the highest-paid actresses in India. Beginning in 2014, Alia appeared in Forbes India’s Celebrity 100 list, based on her income and popularity, and in 2017, she was featured by Forbes Asia in their 30 Under 30 list.

Biography & Wiki

Alia’s nickname is Aloo. She was born on 15 March 1993 in Mumbai, Maharashtra, India. Hence, her current age is 26 years. Alia’s Zodiac is Pisces. Her hometown is Mumbai, Maharashtra, India. Her nationality is British-Indian. She belongs to the Atheist Religion.

Height, Weight & Body Measurements

Alia Bhatt’s height in feet is 5′ 3″. Also, her height in Centimeters is 160 cm.

Family Members

Alia is the daughter of filmmaker Mahesh Bhatt who is also a director, producer, screenwriter. Her mother is an actress and director Soni Razdan. She has an elder sister, Shaheen who was born in 1988. Also, Alia has two half-siblings, Pooja Bhatt who is an actress and director and Rahul Bhatt who is working as a fitness trainer.

Boys, affairs, spouse name

As per media, Alia’s first love is Ramesh Dubey she falls in move with him when she was in the 6th standard. After that, she had a relationship with Ali Dadarkar who is her childhood boyfriend and a very close friend.

There was rumored that Alia dated with actor and co-star Varun Dhawan after their movie Student of the year. Also, there was a buzz that she had an affair with Sidharth Malhotra. Also as per media Alia dated Kavin Mittal who is the son of Indian businessman Sunil Mittal.

Alia currently in a relationship with Bollywood’s heartthrob Ranbir Kapoor. She first met Ranbir Kapoor, when she was 11 years old, and since then, she had a crush on him. Now they are also planning to get married.

Favorite Things

Education and School, College

Alia finished her schooling from Jamnabai Narsee School in 2011 but she is yet to complete her graduation.

Salary and Net Worth

Alia has an estimated net worth of almost $10 million. Moreover, she earns almost Rs.5 to 10 crores for every movie she plays. Also, Alia owns many expensive cars like a Land Rover Range Rover Vogue, an Audi Q7, Audi Q5, Audi Q6, BMW 7-Series, etc.

Contact Address

Alia Bhatt Filmography

Alia Bhatt works in Bollywood Film Industry like her family. Firstly, she was made her debut as a child artist with Hindi Thriller Movie Sangharsh in 1999 as a younger version of Zinta’s character. After that, Alia was made her lead role debut movie Student of The year in 2012 with actors Varun Dhawan and Sidharth Malhotra. Furthermore, She appeared in Many commercial successful Hindi Movies including “2 States (2014), Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania (2014), Kapoor & Sons (2016), Dear Zindagi (2016), Badrinath Ki Dulhania (2017), Highway (2014) and Udta Punjab (2016), etc.

Also, Alia Bhatt has performed playback singing for the song “Sooha Saaha” in Highway (2014). A. R. Rahman, the composer of the film, invited her to his music school to undergo training. Furthermore, In 2014, she sang the unplugged version of the song “Samjhawan”, for the composers Sharib-Toshi, in Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania.

In 2018, she played the lead role in film Raazi directed by Meghna Gulzar and produced by Vineet Jain, Karan Johar. Raazi emerged as the tenth highest-grossing Hindi film of that year. It became the second film driven by a female lead to gross more than ₹ 100 crores in India. Furthermore, Alia received many awards for this movie. It was also a critical success, with Meghna’s direction and Alia’s performance receiving praise.

Awards & Recognition

  • Alia Bhatt is the recipient of several awards, including two Filmfare Awards.
  • Furthermore, She got Vogue and Lamborghini Youth Icon Of The Year in 2018.
  • Also, In 2019 she Grabs the top spot in Times most desirable Women 2018.
  • Also, She got Times of India Film Awards in 2013.
  • Furthermore, In 2019 she Grabs International Indian Film Academy Awards for her movie Raazi.

Facts about Alia Bhatt

  • In 2014, Bhatt launched her own line of clothing for women in association with the online fashion portal Jabong.com; she described the collection to be “very simple” and “very me“.
  • She is also the celebrity endorser for a number of brands and products, including Coca-Cola, Garnier, and Maybelline.
  • Alia has a Tattoo, Written “Pataka” in Hindi on the backside of her neck.
  • She was first seen as a child artist in the film ‘Sanghrash’ (1999) starring Akshay Kumar and Preity Zinta.
  • Earlier, she used to be overweight, but for the demand of a glamours role in her debut film ‘Student of the Year’ (2012). She lost around 16 kg of weight.
  • Also, Alia is an animal lover and has done campaigning for PETA to raise awareness about homeless animals.
  • She likes to use men’s perfumes only.
  • Alia can’t afford to have a meal without curd as she is so addicted to it.
  • Furthermore, Alia Bhatt works in Bollywood Film Industry like her family. 

Controversies

  • She participated in an extravaganza in Uttar Pradesh’s Saifai village (Saifai Mahotsava organized by Samajwadi Party) at the time when Muzzafarnagar riots took place in Uttar Pradesh. She later apologized for it and said that she regrets not being much politically aware.
  • Certainly, Alia was trolled for her lack of general awareness and was labeled as “Beauty without Brains“. She appeared in a chat show “Koffee With Karan“. In this episode, Karan asked the name of the President of India! and she replied Prithviraj Chauhan.
